about-content-1: Hi, glad to see you here! My name is Esdras Silva I am a front-end developer and I study systems analysis and development at the Federal Institute of Science and Technology of Para√≠ba
about-content-2: I fell in love with the world of programming while doing control and automation engineering. I decided to leave the course to seek a central focus of studies, and that's when I found front-end development about a year and a half ago.
about-content-3: Since then, I've been honing my skills in bringing beautiful and functional interfaces to life.
